hero.title: FC CITY BOYS
hero.subtitle: More Than a Club
hero.description: Founded in the 1980s, FC City Boys Zurich is a football club based in Zurich, Switzerland. Proud to be one of the first Tamil football clubs, we stand for passion, unity, and excellence on and off the field.

aboutPreview.title: About FC City Boys
aboutPreview.description: Founded with a vision to create a premier football club, FC City Boys Zurich has been at the forefront of Swiss football. We combine professional excellence with community values, creating an environment where players thrive both on and off the pitch.

moreThanClub.title: MORE THAN A CLUB
moreThanClub.intro: FC City Boys Zurich â€“ More than a club.
moreThanClub.paragraph1: Since our founding in 1989, we have built a strong and loyal community of football lovers. Our supporters stand by us in every match, at home and abroad, supporting the team with passion and pride.
moreThanClub.paragraph2: Through unity, dedication, and love for the game, we continue to grow stronger together and celebrate success as one family.

cards.title: Our goals and values
cards.description: Where passion, community, and sportsmanship come together. The founding members of FC City Boys Zurich laid the foundation for a legacy of sporting excellence and community spirit.

cards.title: Youth and Adult Engagement
cards.description: We want to enable Tamil youth and adults in Switzerland to play football in our club, make contacts with like-minded people, and enjoy socializing.

cards.title: Voluntary efforts
cards.description: The board, the four-person coaching team, and our members volunteer to work towards promoting the sports and personal successes of our players.

cards.title: Core values
cards.description: The goal is to continue achieving many successes. At the same time, we value mutual respect, team spirit, and fair play.
